```

$mod       : function ( qu, value ) {
		var operands = sys.flatten( qu.operands );
		if ( operands.length !== 2 ) {
			throw new Error( "$mod requires two operands" );
		}
		var mod = operands[0];
		var rem = operands[1];
		return value % mod === rem;
	},

```


```
{@lang bash}
#!/bin/bash
echo Please, enter your firstname and lastname
read FN LN 
echo "Hi! $LN, $FN !"
```
